attributes.action: make it a priority to vaccinate children under 5 with the swine flu vaccination as soon as it is made available.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Children under 5 are in the at risk category for swine flu.  They should be vaccinated against the disease before other at risk groups.  These children should be vaccinated before the schools and nursery term commences in September.  This will not only protect these  vulnerable children but also limit the spread of the disease amongst school children and the young.
